ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.016: Azores, Sao Miguel, S coast, E of Ponta Delgada, Ponta de Rosto do Cao; 37°44'N 25°38'W; rocky shore with tide pools and large basin; shore- and snork.; 23.ix.1979
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.069: Canary Islands, SE of Lanzarote; 28°55'N 13°32'W; depth 109-116 m, sand with grey-yellow clay; van Veen grab; 20.v.1980
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.058: Morocco, W of Cape Yubi; 27°58'N 13°24'W; depth 500 m, muddy bottom; 5 m beam trawl; 28.viii.1977
JL.751022: Canary Islands, Gran Canaria, Playa de la Laja; rocky shore; shore collecting; 22/30.x.1975
AV.610531c: France, dep. Pyrénées-Orientales, Cap Peyrefite (= 4 km SE of Banyuls-sur-Mer); 31.v.1961
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.065: Selvagens archipelago, SW of Selvagem Grande; 30°08'N 15°53'W; depth 100 m, grey fine sand, shell gravel; van Veen grab; 21.x.1978
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.071: Madeira archipelago, E of Madeira; 32°41'N 16°35'W; depth 120 m, shells and sand; van Veen grab; 14.iii.1976

ncrsdatagroup.abcd:ProjectTitle: Collecting trip to the Azores in 1979

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: AZO.25b: Azores, Terceira, E coast, Praia da Vitória, S part of northern beach; 38°43'N 27°04'W; rocky shore just N of Forte de Santa Catarina); shore collecting; 2,4,6,.x.1979
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.K06: Canary Islands, E coast of Gran Canaria, Arinaga; 27°51'N 15°24'W; rocks, tide pools, sandy bay, seagrass, depth 0-5 m; ; 4.v.1980
CANCAP-IV, Sta. 4.K01: Canary Islands, N coast of Gran Canaria, Las Palmas, Playa de las Canteras; 28°09'N 15°26'W; rocky areas, sandy lagoon, depth 0-5 m; ; 28.iv.1980
CANCAP-III, Sta. 3.D06: Selvagens archipelago, S coast of Selvagem Grande; 30°08'N 15°52'W; depth 5 to 20 m; scuba diving; 21.x.1978
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.D08: Canary Islands, SW coast of Hierro, off Faro de Orchilla; 27°42'N 18°08'W; rocky bottom with some sand, depth 5-25 m; scuba diving; 5.ix.1977
